column1: # Test Scenario: Test send message flow

column2: Install client agent with command msiexec /i cmdextension.msi SVCENV="Test"

column3: Run wbemtest in PS, connect root/cmd/clientagent,  Click Enum Classes and select Recursive -> OK. Scroll down and double click "HighPriorityIoTHubMessage" -> instances, there should be 20 records

There should be logs: “Plugin 10a949a0-756f-46ab-aa74-68091f1612db executes policy f2fd6b33-6da7-4266-abbb-f74b129105d5 Success but failed to process the result to NoSender” and two logs following: "Start to send 14 messages(size: 200704B) to IotHub" and "Start to send 6 messages(size: 86016B) to IotHub"
